data.headline: Junior UX Designer
data.summary: Passionate UX Designer with a strong background in creating user-centric digital experiences. Skilled in conducting user research, wireframing, prototyping, and UI design. Eager to contribute to the growth of a dynamic startup.

experience.title: UX Designer
experience.paragraph: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for a SaaS platform. Conducted user research, created wireframes and prototypes, and iteratively improved the product based on user feedback. Contributed to the company's design system and ensured consistent branding across all touchpoints.

experience.title: UX Designer
experience.paragraph: Provided UX design services to various clients, ranging from startups to established businesses. Responsibilities included user research, persona development, information architecture, and design of responsive web and mobile applications. Delivered high-quality designs that met client requirements and user needs.

experience.title: UX Design Intern
experience.paragraph: Gained practical experience in the field of UX design during a summer internship. Assisted in user research, wireframing, and prototyping for the university's web portal and mobile app. Collaborated with the design team to implement user-centered design principles and enhance the overall user experience.

projects.name: Fitness Tracker App
projects.description: Designed a mobile app that helps users track their fitness goals, monitor their progress, and receive personalized workout recommendations.

projects.name: E-commerce Website Redesign
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive UX audit and redesigned the user interface of an e-commerce website to improve navigation, product discoverability, and conversion rates.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Warm, friendly expression. Plain background.
